name: color-to-see
description: show all the color of the working directory

color-to-see.languages.description: An array of language ids which should be highlighted by Color Highlight. "*" to trigger on any language; Prepend language id with "!" to exclude the language (i.e "!typescript", "!javascript")

color-to-see.matchWords.description: Highlight color words in all files (grey, green, etc.)

color-to-see.useARGB.description: Highlight HEX values using ARGB instead of RGBA (default)

color-to-see.matchRgbWithNoFunction.description: Highlight rgb without functions like rgb() ('255, 255, 255', [255, 255, 255], '255 255 255', etc.)

color-to-see.rgbWithNoFunctionLanguages.description: An array of language ids which should be highlighted by Color Highlight with the rgbWithNoFunction pattern. "*" to trigger on any language; Prepend language id with "!" to exclude the language (i.e "!typescript", "!javascript")

color-to-see.matchHslWithNoFunction.description: Highlight hsl without functions like hsl() ('255, 100%, 80%', [255, 100%, 80%], '255 100% 80%', etc.)

color-to-see.hslWithNoFunctionLanguages.description: An array of language ids which should be highlighted by Color Highlight with the rgbWithNoFunction pattern. "*" to trigger on any language; Prepend language id with "!" to exclude the language (i.e "!typescript", "!javascript")

color-to-see.markerType.description: Style of the highlight. Can be 'dot-before', 'dot-after', 'foreground', 'background', 'outline', 'underline'

color-to-see.markRuler.description: Highlight colors on the ruler (scroll bar), true/false

color-to-see.sass.includePaths.description: Array of absolute paths to search while perform file lookups.

scripts.pretest: yarn run compile-tests && yarn run compile && yarn run lint
